allow: Bash(powershell -Command "if \(Test-Path ''C:\\Users\\ramos\\all_coding\\galeobeauty\\.next''\) { $size = \(Get-ChildItem -Recurse ''C:\\Users\\ramos\\all_coding\\galeobeauty\\.next'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum\).Sum; Write-Host \(''Total .next size: {0:N2} MB'' -f \($size / 1MB\)\); Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''Breakdown:''; Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Users\\ramos\\all_coding\\galeobeauty\\.next'' -Directory | ForEach-Object { $s = \(Get-ChildItem -Recurse $_FullName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum\).Sum; Write-Host \(''{0}: {1:N2} MB'' -f $_Name, \($s / 1MB\)\) } } else { Write-Host ''.next folder not found - run a build first'' }")
